item.title: Pol'and'Rock Festival 2020
item.description: 2020 is really weird. SARS-CoV-2 ðŸ¦ caused, we had to sitting at our homes, with only virtual entertainment. After few months, goverments allows for some events, but with strictly rules ðŸ˜·. Thats why, Woodstock festival in Poland (nowadays known as Pol’and’Rock) took place in internet this year. Only small group of lucky guys, won a tickets (Woodstock was never ticketed), rest of us, had to watch festival in the Internet. For these three days my home turns into “festival stage”.
